arts.ttl: Player ratings: Holstein Kiel 1 - 6 Bayern Munich — vote here!
arts.sum: That was a blink-and-you-missed-it game from Bayern Munich in a 6-1 Bundesliga road win over Holstein Kiel that took the Bavarians to top of the table. In just the first minute, Bayern hit Kiel over the top, Harry Kane flicking on to Jamal Musiala.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich coach Vincent Kompany praises midfield depth after strong first Bundesliga start from João Palhinha
arts.sum: In the opening two Bundesliga games, Bayern Munich manager, Vincent Kompany, wasn’t exactly experimental with his midfield selection, starting a trio of Aleksandar Pavlović, Joshua Kimmich and Jamal Musiala. Bayern’s third Bundesliga match against Holstein Kiel, however, saw a small adjustment with Portuguese international João Palhinha coming in for Pavlović.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich sporting director, Max Eberl, believes Joshua Kimmich is ready to be the face of Bayern Munich
arts.sum: It is quite surprising to hear Eberl refer to Kimmich as a future face of the club. Kimmich has since responded to Eberl’s comments (as captured by @iMiaSanMia ): “Generally speaking, it’s always nice to hear the backing and support from the club.

arts.ttl: Manuel Neuer rues missed opportunity for a Bayern Munich clean sheet against Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: A spectator for most of the match, Bayern club captain Manuel Neuer had some positives to take away from the game. Bayern Munich got back into action after the international break with a booming 6-1 demolition of newly promoted Holstein Kiel, continuing the strong start to the Vincent Kompany era.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane nets his first hat-trick of the season as Bayern hammer Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Bayern raced into a 3-0 lead within 13 minutes of kick-off.

arts.ttl: Three observations from Bayern Munich’s 6-1 thumping of Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Micheal Olise added a fifth in the second half only for Kiel to score one back, but Kane finished the job and converted his penalty to record his first hat trick of the new season. The floodgates opened within the very first seconds as Jamal Musiala put Bayern ahead and two goals in quick succession from Harry Kane and Kiel’s own defender saw Bayern take an early 3-0 lead before the 15-minute mark.

arts.ttl: Barcelona, PSG Suffer Setback as Bayern Munich Ace Open to Contract Extension Talks
arts.sum: During the summer transfer window, Paris Saint-Germain expressed interest in Bayern Munich midfielder Joshua Kimmich. However, the experienced player decided to remain with the Bavarian club to see out the final year of his contract. But there’s now a new twist that could spell trouble for both clubs. If Kimmich doesn’t agree to a contract […] The post Barcelona, PSG Suffer Setback as Bayern Munich Ace Open to Contract Extension Talks appeared first on PSG Talk.

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s dominant victory over Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: He was Kiel’s one solid performer in midfield despite his tender age and status as a new transfer, winning most of his duels and completing most of his passes as his partners Nicolai Remberg and Lewis Holtby suffered abysmal games. Despite being criticized for a poor EURO 2024 performance, Kane has yet again reminded us why he is so indubitably brilliant with a phenomenal three goals, taking advantage of multiple half-chances in the first half to score two — while somehow contriving to miss the easy chances — before completing his hat-trick with a penalty he won himself in the second half.

Bayern Munich's Harry Kane scored a hat trick as they crushed promoted Holstein Kiel 6-1 away on Saturday to lead the Bundesliga after three matches with a maximum nine points. Jamal Musiala slotted home after the hosts repeatedly failed to clear the ball in the first minute and England forward Kane doubled their lead six minutes later following a mistake by Lewis Holtby, whose pass was intercepted by Serge Gnabry .

arts.ttl: Kane scores hat-trick in thumping Bayern Munich win
arts.sum: Bayern Munich score after just 13 seconds and Harry Kane grabs a hat-trick in an emphatic Bundesliga win at Holstein Kiel.
